title: Medix - Health Care Booking System (Still On progress)
description: Medix is a booking management system designed specifically for healthcare services. It simplifies the process of managing patient appointments, providing tools for both patients and administrators to efficiently handle scheduling, confirmations, and cancellations. The platform is fully responsive, ensuring smooth performance across all devices.

title: Royal Swedish Sailing Society History / KSSS Historia
description: History website for our client the Royal Swedish Sailing Society.  crafted in collaboration with the innovative minds of Hyper Island's UX/UI students.  First project using Next.js and a headless CMS called Sanity.io

title: Tick
description: Integrated backend into our todo list project. Built on REST principles and HTTP Protocol best practices with integrated database support, user authentication system. CI/CD pipelines automate testing and deployment. Made with detailed queries to tailored authentication mechanisms.

title: ArtQuize
description: An art quiz for the basic fundamentals of JavaScript, utilizing the API from the Art Institute of Chicago.
